review: One of this games first cutscenes involves a penguin version of arnold svartzenegger (i can't spell that) in apenguin version of the cold war soviet union, he says (and i quote): 'we have cloned him, how can he fight himself when he is just... one... little... chicken..., i will kill him, and then i will eat him.' FOLLOWED BY A CHICKEN JETPACK FIGHTING SEGMENT BEST GAME 2014!!!!!
